title: Probability of Basketball Scores Above 163 Total Points
question_text:
Suppose Jane is interested in the total number of points scored in Division I NCAA college basketball games. She takes a look at several years of data and finds this distribution is approximately normal with a mean of $154\text{ points}$ and standard deviation of $9\text{ points}$.
Using the empirical rule, what is the probability of finding a random game where the total points scored is $163$ or greater?
